name: io.github.Tsubaki414/toolfi
description: Open API Marketplace for AI Agents. Crypto data tools with USDC payments on Base. Token security, DeFi yields, bridge routes, swap quotes, gas tracking.

tools.name: crypto_price
tools.description: Get real-time cryptocurrency prices with 24h change

tools.name: token_security
tools.description: Detect honeypots, rug pulls, and token risks via GoPlus

tools.name: defi_yields
tools.description: Find top DeFi yields across all chains via DefiLlama

tools.name: bridge_quote
tools.description: Get cross-chain bridge routes via Li.Fi

tools.name: swap_quote
tools.description: Get DEX swap routes via Li.Fi

tools.name: protocol_tvl
tools.description: Get DeFi protocol TVL data from DefiLlama

tools.name: gas_tracker
tools.description: Get real-time gas prices for EVM chains
